website_summaries.verdict: One of the biggest and most covetable of the L.O.L. Surprise! brand right now. 50 surprises, many of which are limited edition.
pros: With 50 different surprises, your child will be busy for hours finding them
Less expensive than getting multiple smaller surprises
cons: The same dolls are in every ball, so you shouldn't get more than one per child

customer_reviews.title: ONG my daughter has just unwrapped this on Christmas morning ...
customer_reviews.text: ONG my daughter has just unwrapped this on Christmas morning and it was empty?!!! Now got a very upset child on Christmas morning?
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this was very disappointing. You are better off just buying the dolls themselves in the small balls. You only get two big dolls and two little sisters. Then a bunch of little tiny accessories and bath bombs. It wasn’t that great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My package came opened and with some itens missing!!!!!! Can u imagine my kids frustration?
customer_reviews.author: Natalia von Poser

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give less than one star I would. Don’t waste your money. Give your kid $5 in quarters and let them get cheap garbage from the gumball machines it will save you a ton of money and maybe the toy quality would be better. Also you won’t have a huge pile of plastic wrap to get get rid of once you are done unwrapping each of these things and harming the environment. The amount of plastic waste (not including the actual junky plastic toys) is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift! The fizz balls are NOT for in baths
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 and LOVES these balls this big one was cool although i wish it had been a whole ball not a 1/2 ball w a flat surface. Also they don’t tell you this fizz balls are NOT for in the BATH!! We had been using them in there since series one so i wasn’t too pleased to hear that w the fizz ball maker. But as far as this ball besides them all having the same surprises my daughter liked it (I’d have liked to buy 2 for the storage but didn’t want all the doubles). She can’t wait for the pearl ball to come out next!
customer_reviews.author: Holly’s mom

customer_reviews.title: The smiles are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars because it absolutely made my 6.5 year olds Christmas. The sheer joy on her face as she opened the box to find the giant LOL with 50 surprises was priceless. I certainly don’t think the toys are anything near the price I paid, but I’d gladly do it again to see my kiddo jump for joy.
customer_reviews.author: T Warren

customer_reviews.title: Your mileage may vary but mine was empty.
customer_reviews.text: Received the gold ball and my daughter was so excited. She opened it to find it was empty! It had all the little balls in there but totally empty. It was awful, but the day was saved. The bad thing is, she still wants this expensive hunk of plastic. FYI it was an amazon warehouse deal. I have generally had pretty decent results buying from warehouse deals but with these LOL surprise dolls I have not had very much luck
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: A pile of small plastic parts in a cheap plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: A pile of small plastic parts in a cheap plastic shell. Once my Granddaughter opened up all the surprises that was about it. She never played with it again. Quite a gimmick for the price. Buy something else that is of value, not on cheap plastic stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amticks

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This item was last Christmas sensation for girls, we got it at 7 pm on Christmas eve, just on time. My daughter really loved it but i personally think it was a little overpriced, i do understand the season high demand on this product and that is how prices rise (call it supply and demand, economic models etc..) but honestly i think it should be between the 45-50 dollars range. Her amazed face on Christmas was worth the price i paid for this item, but after 3 months i have only seen the big ball under her bed. LOL, what a SURPRISE!
customer_reviews.author: Mister Kiu

customer_reviews.title: LOL surprise balls
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing about this product that I liked biggest waste of money I've ever seen the prizes inside was not as it advertised it was just a expensive piece of junk oughta be ashamed for selling this especially for the price could not send unless it was rated I read it at one star don't think it even qualified for that I know two other people who bought this was as disappointed as I was
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rice

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it. Worth every penny watching my granddaughter take FOREVER to open every last surprise. It really was one surprise after another. Over half an hour just to open them all. So much fun for us adults to watch.
customer_reviews.author: I'mDina

customer_reviews.title: ... MUCH for a gift (thanks YouTube) but really the fun part is opening and unwrapping the surprises
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this SO VERY MUCH for a gift (thanks YouTube) but really the fun part is opening and unwrapping the surprises. Once all the surprises were open, she didn’t touch the toys inside. There are accessories inside but only 4 Dolls (2 reg, 2 little sisters). High price for less than 30 min of fun. I gave it 3 stars because of her excitement opening it and the fact that the items are Exclusive. Overall not a great value but made my daughter very happy (even if only for a short time).
customer_reviews.author: Rainier Pinca

customer_reviews.title: If you kid is into these toys, they're gonna love this thing.  Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my daughter. She was absolutely thrilled. She spent an hour opening it (not even doing the fizzes, just the individual things) and loved every minute of it. She was totally over the moon about getting this... I mean, it's a giant plastic version of the already overpriced plastic toys. Is this in any way objectively worth it (even if Santa paid just retail)? Nope. If you kid loves LOL Surprise dolls are they gonna flip out over this thing? Yep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Durand

customer_reviews.title: Expensive plastic toys
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for part of her birthday last year because several of her friends have it. Exciting for her to open the individual "pods", but really overpriced in my opinion for what you get. I knew what it was when I ordered it for her. She was really excited and the look on her face was worth the investment for me. I would not want to buy this again though because she doesn't really play with these toys very often anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JC3

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced - but totally adorbs!
customer_reviews.text: I knew what was in it before buying, from watching youtube toy reviews (- pstoyreviews shows the doll color changes in icy water, as well). I really love the dolls and clothes, and the price was unable to talk me out of buying it. LOL Surprise! dolls make me smile, especially the glittery ones :-) - and these are *very* glittery, including the eyes. And it's a way of getting some cool extra doll clothes without the Fashion Crush gel to deal with. I enjoyed unwrapping everything in this set :-).
customer_reviews.author: imdebra

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this is worth the money. The toys are low quality, and there are not 50 surprises as advertised. They must be counting the plastic containers as part of that 50. My kids were happy, but that's because they didn't have to pay for it. This is a $20 toy.
customer_reviews.author: lushnight

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $80 maybe worth $30
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my daughter.... She really wanted one for xmas. I should of convinced her to get something else. She did like... That's the only reason you get 3 stars. Not worth $80 at all.... Not even half. Will not be buying anymore lol stuff.
customer_reviews.author: HomeBoy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Not a good value. Only a few large LOL dolls and the rest of are smaller balls and a few bath bombs. Cheaper to piece it out and you're stuck with a huge basketball size plastic thing that my kid never plays with. Now I've got to be the bad guy and throw it away when she's at school. See what you do to us parents, toy makers?? OK, I digress... it's great for the kids but not for the parents.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: i already knew what i was buying, definitely not worth the money but seeing my little girl happy and smile is worth 100% the money. only complain i got is that i got a double or repeated baby sister of the lol dolls, my little was expecting to have one of each little sisters. now shes got 2 of the same baby sisters and a big sister thats without a baby sister....not sure if i got a defective lol ball or i was suppose to get one of each i saw a loT of lol big surprise videos on you tube a all of them came with one of each matching they're big sister.
customer_reviews.author: Abisai

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if they like these dolls.
customer_reviews.text: These little dolls are so cute and while it is a lot of plastic waste she is absolutely in love with everything that came out of it, so I am not complaining because it was fun just watching her open this giant ball thing with all the little surprises inside. She has not stopped playing with them every day since christmas and has added even more since then to her collection. And I think they are hilarious too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was expecting 50 amazing surprises and 46 were small charms or accessories (i.e. shoes, bags). The instructions were not thorough so we needed you tube assistance. Overall, I was disappointed and so was my daughter. It should be half the price or even less.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves, I expected more!
customer_reviews.text: Of course no grown up is going to think this is worth the money but kids love these tiny toys. My daughter enjoyed opening each little ball! She now uses the case to hold all her little dolls and accessories. I feel like more product should come inside for the price. But from a kids point of view, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOL Dolls - one of the better buys!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the LOL doll purchases I have made, this was a better purchase. I still say that the "unwrapping" is what they love the most. They get disappointed when they open the dolls and there is nothing left to unwrap. It came with 2 Big Sisters, 2 Little Sisters, 5 fizzies (which I personally hate!) and 10 accessories. She had a blast opening it and still plays with them today. She loves all of the accessories and dolls. Best Advice: find a container to put all the shoes, bottles, glasses and clothes into. They will be lost in no time!!
customer_reviews.author: EducatedBookFreak

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it but for the price, it's terrible!! These are very cheap items, very cheaply made, poor quality. The company should be ashamed to sell these at the price they do. I have seen better quality items come out of gumball machines, it's what comes to mind, gumball machine toys if I had to describe them to someone that didn't know what to expect. There are 4 dolls and tiny accessories. Not worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have 50 pieces inside
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product!! I Was very disappointed and sad that I had purchased this item for my daughter for Christmas!! If I would have known how cheap and what little items were inside I would have NEVER spent that kind of money on it!! I can’t believe how any company can justify the price of this chintzy product!! It didn’t even have 50 pieces inside like advertised!! Not worth any more than $5.00!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany paga

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed...but my kid is happy
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was buying based on reviews...however my daughter whined about this for months and earned the money herself. She was over the moon happy to get it. Shipping was quick. Packed well. No complaints...except to the makers of LOLs where the joke is on the parents and none of us are LOL. If you can get away without buying this I don’t recommend it because it’s a waste of money in anyone’s mind who’s not a 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a big deal
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It seems like a big deal, but it's a bunch of filler and a few toys. My daughter's anticipation of the idea of this toy was way greater than what the product delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Playing Favorites

customer_reviews.title: A LOT OF MONEY FOR CHEAP PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it can hurt the enviroment. Imagine a lot of kids throwing it out that can hurt it .Its too much money for cheap plastic that can hurt the earth.Just take my word and don't buy it.Im really disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: This was a huge hit for Christmas. If your ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for Christmas. If your child is into the L.O.L dolls, then the price is ok. The whole allure is the "unboxing experience". My only issue would be that they're all the same. You mean, for this price, they couldn't mix it up a bit? There shoulve been several different varieties. No one is buying them now, because we already know what's inside, and have it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Already opened and done!
customer_reviews.text: Libby Coleman ordered lol big ball gave this to my 5year old granddaughter on her birthday didn't even open box when it arrived she opened it and it had already been opened and done
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Always a duplicate
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed at Christmas when both my daughters asked for this $75 surprise ball and both had the exact same doll and accessories Same with all the lol bigger suprises It’s a bummer ....what is surprising about that when you get multiples and they know exactly what’s inside and that’s a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: christina88

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been begging for this ever since she started seeing these things everywhere on YouTube. I was adamant about not buying it because around Christmas time it was very pricey. It has since dropped in price but still more than I thought it was worth which is why i took away 1 star but my daughter was very excited about it. There was 1 empty bag in mine but it was one of the smaller bags so I'm sure we didn't miss out on much.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: For those complaining about the contents...you obviously had no clue what LOL dolls where to begin with. It’s exactly what I expected it to be. My daughter has been obsessed with these lol dolls for a while now and I have spent more than I care to admit on them. My child has also spent her own money buying them. She was more than excited (and actually screamed) when she started opening it.
customer_reviews.author: 4U2Know

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! No pieces were missing. There was a lot of plastic waste. They should have wrapped everything in white paper, at least then I could have composted the waste, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrance Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE this. Im suer the Devil himself packaged this ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE this. Im suer the Devil himself packaged this unholy thing though. There was SO MUCH TRASH. I think thats part of the fun. Weird ass sadistic kids now days love trash. Anyway, id order it again. It was a good price. Made my bratty kids happy. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: NotAMuggle

customer_reviews.title: Missing products inside.
customer_reviews.text: In the first row of products it only had two out of 10 things in a little balls. So basically no accessories for the little dolls. Very disappointed. I knew when I bought the product that the wrapper was missing from the outside but it didn't say anything about missing products in it.
customer_reviews.author: Weslie Orme

customer_reviews.title: But my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely give this 5 stars exeptnfor the fact the price was way too high for what you actually get. I was definitly ripped off as far as price gauging goes. But my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri A.

customer_reviews.title: No Surprise Here!
customer_reviews.text: Surprise product was not a surprise! Same dolls in same container from other family members. For this huge price, Lildolls should offer a variety selection
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews and decide for yourselves.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to write a good review BUT..... this is absolutely worthless! The pieces are so small, only a total of 4 dolls, two small and two smaller. A lot of small pieces and a lot of dead space in this container. I’d watched a video and saw that there were more dolls so that’s why I decided to get it for my granddaughters 4th Birthday. Parents, this is JUNK! Yes my granddaughter was amazed by it and loved it so that’s the only reason I gave it 3 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Myers

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter Loved This!!
customer_reviews.text: I could take apart the marketing that gave rise to this plastic mysterious expensive item that little girls love. BUT, my granddaughter laughed and talked non-stop for close to one hour as she unwrapped the clothes/dolls/etc. included in this package. I could complain about the cost and plastics. But I had a lot of fun with my grandaughter. And that's worth a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jodyann

customer_reviews.title: PRICE WAS 59 DOLLARS IN MARCH2018 WHEN I PURCHASED IT WAS IT A PRICE MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in March 2018 for a bday present for 1 granddaughter and she loved it. My other granddaughter wanted one also for her bday last Aug2018 but the price had almost tripled and my budget couldn't handle the price. We both were heartbroken.. So I am Xmas shopping and it is still high. Messed up!!!! Something becomes popular and kids love it and then they increase prices because they think we just got to buy it. WRONG in a lot of ways..If I had done this review in March I would have given it 6 stars because she did love it
customer_reviews.author: goodcook1957

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad price.
customer_reviews.text: It was very cool, my daughter loved it. My only complaint is I spent way more than it really costs. The ball is $80 new. What people do is buy them and resell them for around $120. But I cant be that mad. I respect the hustle. Anyways this ball kept her entertained and happy for a very long time. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but exactly the same
customer_reviews.text: Even though my daughters loved these. Wish they offered different things inside. They are exactly the same every single one. They were bummed they got the same stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, a lot of packaging waste
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this. I think past of the fun of this type is the unwrapping of the packaging. Unfortunately, it makes for a lot of waste in our landfills.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D H Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The product is great! I was so nervous after reading all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! I was so nervous after reading all the reviews and seeing ones about missing pieces or how the product is really poorly made, but I didn't have any missing pieces and the product is made nicely. It was definitely everything I was expecting to see. This is a clever idea and little girls love it. It's a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy more than 1.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it for the price don't buy more than 1 all of them are exactly the same dolls and accessories. I spent 65 dollars just to get 2 big sisters 2 little sisters and 10 accessories a d 5 of the fizz bomb things which cannot be used in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but only once- all are identical
customer_reviews.text: The amount of surprises that come in it is awesome, but unfortunately we purchased 3, and all 3 were identical, so there really wasn’t much “surprise”, and the girls were a little disappointed. The first one opened was a blast, the second two were just going through the motions. I wish it was listed somewhere that there’s no variety!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni P.

customer_reviews.title: Each ball has the exact same items ....
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing for all the fuss as eBay single BIG surprise ball contained the exact same products and items ... my daughter received 4 of these so everything times 4 :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fuzz about nothing
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter wanted the L.O.L. Surprise so badly for Christmas! She had great expectations after seeing it on her iPad and "begged" santa clause for getting it to her. She manage to open all the packaging within 30 min but was so disappointed by the content - just 4 dolls with a lot of tiny accessories. Long story short we threw the whole thing out within 12 hours. My daughter usually has lot of patience and is good at playing "pretend" play as such I can only give this product one star - especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Birgitte Danielsen

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it. Everything that came was packed the way ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. Everything that came was packed the way it’s supposed to be. I saw some people questioning if this was the real toy and I can say that this is definitely the real product. I will be ordering again for my daughter on her birthday and for my other niece’s birthday. They simply love those surprise toys.
customer_reviews.author: giselle

customer_reviews.title: Personally I don't think it is worth the money. ...
customer_reviews.text: Personally I don't think it is worth the money. I purchased it as a sale item. These tiny pieces is not worth the money at all. It was cost efficient to buy the big lol surprise versus purchasing individual. I purchased it as a Christmas gift for my 10 year old daughter because it was on her Christmas list. To see her big smile on her face made purchasing it priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Love2save

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Best LOL my girls had a blast with this toy, a bit disappointed that it was the same doll in both big surprise balls, not sure if this was coincidence or is just one doll. However the toy did not disappoint at all a must have A bit pricey but LOL are pricey 😁
customer_reviews.author: seral97

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: There is only one doll inside. Save yourself the money and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Of course my daughter was excited to open this present,but for $60 it is so not worth it. You would be better off buying the LOL doll seperate balls and have them open those. The ball comes with 5 bath bombs which have a dinky charm inside and 4 surprise dolls ( 2 big and 2 lil sisters). Those 4 dolls in the store would cost $34. There are also 12 or so little accessory balls (Shoes or bottles etc) . My opinion complete waste. THANKS COOKIE SWIRL C AND YOU TUBE FOR PROMOTING A TOY That my child hasn't touched since actually opening.
customer_reviews.author: A Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Knew this toy was going to be a joke but my daughter wanted one so bad. She liked it but I was unimpressed. We got 3 of the same exact doll just 2 different sizes. Kinda takes the “surprise” out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Daily

customer_reviews.title: Same as every other. Value? $29 LOL
customer_reviews.text: WOWOWWOW!! NO NO NO NO NO NO!! It's like the other reviews, no variety in each one. A lot of glitter items, great. But wish each one had different items. More of a $29 Value IMO from a adult point of view. My kid, 1000% value!
customer_reviews.author: John DelayNoMore L.

customer_reviews.title: Not that exciting, overpriced, generates tons of trash
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. It has lots of worthless stuff like the little dissolvable balls with a tiny plastic charm. Lots of the balls also have a pair of shoes or something tiny. Probably better to just order two of the regular LOL balls. And don’t get two because they all have the same toys inside.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Over the Moon and More
customer_reviews.text: I paid $60.00 for something worth no more than $20.00. (I remember when Disney offered quality merchandise.) But this LOL capsule was the dream gift opened by my Darling Diva on her fifth birthday; that fact makes this rather trashy item almost priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Nana of Three

customer_reviews.title: Our First L.O.L. Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for My Youngest Daughter & Myself. This was Absolutely The Cutest, & The Most Fun! We Really Enjoy & If you like Surprises or just L.O.L’s in general, then I’d Highly suggest this one! (Great quality time to spend & Enjoy with your child)!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t understand why, but my 5 year old loves these things
customer_reviews.author: Joe LegalTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Price was too high because it was a seller's market for Christmas that year.  But overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a child's Christmas gift when it was difficult to find. The child was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: It was a little disappointing. I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little disappointing. I thought it would have a mixture of the dolls - Glitter, Regular dolls, little sister and pets. The only doll balls it had was Glitter dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary M

customer_reviews.title: Saved Christmas (although the twins had to share since one ...
customer_reviews.text: Saved Christmas (although the twins had to share since one was the limit) but even though this stuff is probably way overpriced, it was by far the hit at Christmas (even was favored over the Barbie power wheels dune) They lived all the surprises inside.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great especially with amazon prime
customer_reviews.text: Sold out everywhere for Christmas, traveled to Disneyland for my daughters as that was the big xmas surprise but the only thing she wnated was big lol surprise that we searched everywhere found it on amazon and shipped it to the hotel and arrived on xmas eve!!! We ordered it Friday the 22nd. Everything was there she loves it. And we love it
customer_reviews.author: Devan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not great value for $ at full retail.
customer_reviews.text: They count each tot ball as 7 surprises etc. You only get 2 tots, 2 Little sisters for dolls. The rest of the surprises are all accessories counted piece by tiny piece to get to 50. That said mine came from Amazon wharehouse deals at a discount and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter liked this well enough
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter liked this well enough, but when the package was opened, 2 of the larger spots for the surprise dolls were empty. They were missed when packing. I want to know how to get this corrected. I spent $70 on this Christmas gift and would like to have to dolls sent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cross

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun to open
customer_reviews.text: It is legitimate, not counterfeit. It’s fun to open, it takes time so my daughter was occupied for a while. The container is cute and can be used to store items. Better storage for the smaller items or the baby sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the same! Never buy more than one. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought 3 for her birthday because she really loves them. But they were all the same. What is the point of a surprise thing when they are all the same.
customer_reviews.author: carpitol

customer_reviews.title: Lots of LOL balls to pop in different ways. Lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Lots and lots of plastic. I should of went for the easy open one. Lots of pieces and takes awhile to get there but each surprise is worth it. The water bombs are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lacie E

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it!!! It was an Easter Lol Surprise!! She's 8 and still needs a little help opening but it's fun. Fizz charms take a bit but I guess it's natural. Overall a fun time.
customer_reviews.author: Llamma

customer_reviews.title: The LOL BIG SURPRISE
customer_reviews.text: MY Daughter loved giant LOL it but it was Pricey! you get two glitter big sisters two little sisters and accessories and charm bath bomb balls the actual big ball is flat in the back..
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mel 👜🛍

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They really should tell you these all contain the exact same things...
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Grandchild loves this, this year!
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Grand child loved this gift. I believe the mystery of what you get is what is so good. Don't know how it was afterwards but at the moment it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rodocker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my 9 year old daughter. The gift that just keeps giving...even the bath bombs reveal a hidden gift. The dolls are too cute and the whole thing provides never ending entertainment. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 7 year old granddaughter for Christmas. This is a dangerous product. Granddaughter put one of the balls in water and put her hands in the water and we almost had to take her to hospital. Her hands started immediately burning and swelling up. She was screaming in horrific pain. Ran hands under water for 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pope

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas after she saw a YouTube video. She was quite surprised. Lots of little things to open. Each little package is a surprise. Lots of little accessories.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls
customer_reviews.text: If your child loves Lol they are going to want this, wonderful large ball to store all small shoes and clothes and dolls.

customer_reviews.title: After my daughter watched people open this product on YouTube ...
customer_reviews.text: After my daughter watched people open this product on YouTube many times she finally received one and it has kept her attention for quite some time.

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy.
customer_reviews.text: Kid played with it for about 30 mins and was done. Over priced.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself a lot of money. This is a $70 toy filled with quarter machine toys. The only thing worth keeping is the package it came in.

customer_reviews.text: Expensive ! The other one one here I should have gotten it was more pieces and they were bigger this was not worth it!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was happy but this was a huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy but this was a huge waste of money. Also, buying this set saved nothing over buying the items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Marked Twine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $5
customer_reviews.text: What a rip off! Yes an Lol Surprise for the parents spending $142 on a ball of plastic with little plastic surprises in it. I bet it cost about $5 to make this in China. For anyone considering this, Stop and don’t waste your money. Convince ur kid to pick something else and teach them what it means to be ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: My kids were SO happy to get this
customer_reviews.text: My kids were SO happy to get this. They even played together without fighting. That alone may have been worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: sg5432

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my 8yr old sister. She got two dolls she didn’t have before and she just loved going through the different layers that is within this Big ball.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised- in perfect condition and factory sealed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled with this. Nothing was missing, all items were there and nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Surprise Ruined with "Frustration Free Packaging"
customer_reviews.text: The product was OK.. A lot of small surprises but my daughter enjoyed it. Paid retail price 69.99 and to me that was a bit expensive for the items included. My daughters Christmas gift was also ruined because I didn't know that "Frustration Free Packaging" meant the shipping would not be discreet. It was packaged in the original package with the "LOL" writing in logo on the box. Very upset about that.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Dre

customer_reviews.title: Lol big surprise
customer_reviews.text: Just got it within 1day and when my daughter saw it, she screamed like there was no tomorrow. She's loving it and everything in it

customer_reviews.title: 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, I think they are extremely over priced personally

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I bought one of these for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought one of these for my daughter at Christmas time and thought it was wonderful, so I decided to get her 2 more and to our surprise both were exactly the same as the one she already had gotten. I thought these were supposed to have different dolls in each. Not the case at all. Very disappointed. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift for young girl
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loved this. My husband did not (the price). Gave us something to do for 45 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a joy to watch being opened! Everything is packaged as a surprise to unwrap, and the dolls and accessories were in good condition!

customer_reviews.title: ... and there's actually something inside fuzz got a really good deal on it I always go between Amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece's birthday she loves the LOL's and this big ball came with so many little lol's and then came with a whole bunch of ones you put in water and they froze up and there's actually something inside fuzz got a really good deal on it I always go between Amazon and eBay the check prices I saved $20 something by going through Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old grand daughter loved opening on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grand daughter loved opening on Christmas. Plays with them all the time. Pain opening each an everyone. Packaging could be easier opening for the kids.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product

customer_reviews.title: Loose caked on glitter on over half of the items.
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for the glitter, I would say 5 star. Had to throw out half of the items in the ball due to the glitter being so loose and caked on. Why do toys have glitter on them? Its horrible for the environment, it gets in kids eyes, it gets in pets mouths, and its obnoxious. If glitter is an issue, do not buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great to received the item just in time for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item for my daughter for Christmas. It was great to received the item just in time for Christmas. My daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loved it and enjoyed peeling back every layer of LoLs
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of “surprises” provided your child has not watched any unboxing videos. My 6 year old loved it and enjoyed peeling back every layer of LoLs.
